resources.string: All words will be deleted from the word list.
All the cells you fill in will be removed.
"All of this app's data will be deleted. This includes all word pairs and saved games."

- The twist is that instead of numbers, you will be playing with pairs of words instead.\n - You may press and hold any cell that contains a word to see the translation of the word as a hint.\n - Be warned that in doing so, the game will keep track of how often you use a hint and interpret that as you having difficulty with that particular word.

- The board will appear as a regular Japanese Sudoku puzzle, however, you will be filling in the cells with word instead of the usual numbers.\n - To determine which numbers correspond to which word, press and hold a number and an audio will be played in another language to instruct you which word should be placed here.
- Similar to golf\'s scoring system, the higher the score, the more the game thinks you have difficulty with this word pair.

- Make sure your textfile is saved in this format as a CSV file "wordID,english,french,score".
 - For the score column, 1 should be default
 For example: 1,hello,bonjour,1
 - Next is to make sure the CSV is on your phone and that you can find it using the file navigation that pops up when you want to import.
This game operates on the same basis as a regular Japanese Sudoku puzzle.
